rounds.category: A PITCH FOR A HAPPIER MOVIE ENDING
rounds.comments: (Alex: We would like you to name the movie.)

clues.text: It's a little out of the box but hey, I'm thinking...what if Daniel Day-Lewis just skips the theater & stays in the White House?
I agree, the 2 title ladies leap off the cliff in their car...but! But! They "Smokey & the Bandit" the canyon & land safely!
I know it ends the movie quickly, but what if that guy doesn't kill the dog of "the boogeyman"/ unstoppable killing machine?

From Greek words for "first" & "actor", it's the main character in a story

Strangely, this unit is equal to about 1 1/2 times the power an average equine can exert
This measure is equal to 12 dozen

This biblical unit of length is derived from the distance from the elbow to the middle fingers's tip

This was King George VI's first name; his family called him Bertie

rounds.text: The 3 elements whose names begin with 2 vowels are iodine & these 2, one synthetic & one natural
